mapper.select: SELECT Rating.rating_data AS rating, Menu.name AS name FROM Rating RIGHT JOIN Menu ON Rating.Menu_id = Menu.id JOIN Daily_meal ON (Daily_meal.menu = Menu.id AND Daily_meal.date_value = #{_date})
SELECT a.Menu_id AS id, b.name AS name, (SUM(a.rating_data)*20) / COUNT(a.rating_data) AS ratio FROM Rating AS a JOIN Menu AS b ON a.Menu_id = b.id GROUP BY Menu_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Rating (User_id, Menu_id, rating_data) VALUES (#{_userId}, #{_menuId}, #{ratingData})
mapper.update: UPDATE Rating SET bad_reason = #{_badreason} WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM (SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM Rating) AS temp);
mapper.select: UPDATE Menu AS t1, ( SELECT Menu_id, sum(rating_data)/count(Menu_id) AS c1 FROM Rating GROUP BY Menu_id ) AS t2 SET t1.score=t2.c1 WHERE t1.id = t2.Menu_id;
